title: 6X: The Uncensored Confessions
description: Sex. Fame. Rock 'n' Roll.Four teens on the fast track to pop-rock superstardom reveal the uncensored truth about the glamorous, backstabbing world of sudden celebrity.Introducing...The Sweet, trusting Kendall sings like an angel--and is about to discover her devilish side.The Rich, spoiled Wynn can't keep a beat to save her life. But with curves like that...who cares?The No-nonsense Stella is all confidence, attitude, style, and smarts. But her relationship with the band's manager makes her more vulnerable than she thinks.The A/B has got real talent. Now if only he can keep his mind on the music...instead of on the girls.6 Idolize THIS!
author: Nina Malkin
